00020 #ifndef USERBUTTON_H
00021 #define USERBUTTON_H
00022 
00023 #include <QPushButton>
00024 
00029 class QPixmap;
00030 class UserButton : public QPushButton
00031 {
00032 Q_OBJECT
00033 public:
00034     UserButton(QWidget *parent, QString username, QString fullName, QPixmap& foto, QPalette& backGround,int width=0,int height=0);
00035     ~UserButton();
00036     QString username(){return user;}
00037     QString fullName(){return fname;}
00038     const QPixmap& foto(){return image;}
00039     const QPixmap& background(){return bg;}
00040     
00041 private:
00042     QString user;
00043     QString fname;
00044     QPixmap image;
00045     QPixmap bg;
00046 private slots:
00047     void slotClicked();
00048 signals:
00049     void userSelected(UserButton*);
00050 };
00051 #endif
